name: Swidget
0:
”Alexa, dim lamp to 10%”
”Alexa, turn on Swidget 1”
”Alexa, turn off Swidget 1”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Make your home a smart(er) home! Control your Swidget Wi-Fi connected Inserts with your voice using Alexa enabled devices. Our skill will work with any of Swidget’s Wi-Fi connected Inserts, including, Wi-Fi Power Control, Wi-Fi Power Control + USB, Wi-Fi Power Control + Guide Light, and Wi-Fi Power Control + Power Out Light.

Follow the directions on the the Swidget App for iOS or Android to connect your Swidget Wi-Fi connected Inserts to your home network. Search for Swidget on the Alexa App and enable to use. Link your Alexa account using your Swidget credentials. Once connected, Alexa will prompt you to Discover Devices. The Swidget Inserts that are connected to your Swidget account will then be available to connect. Add devices on their own or to groups to control multiple Swidget Inserts at one time.

You can say Turn on or off [Swidget name], or Turn on or off [Group name].
